title: Rugby World Cup 2019 semi-final fixtures: match dates, kick-off times and results so far
text:
The 2019 Rugby World Cup is fast approaching its concluding stages as England, New Zealand, Wales, and South Africa prepare for the semi-finals this weekend.

Last week's quarter finals saw Australia, Ireland, France and Japan all leave the competition.

Here is the full list of remaining fixtures for the final four countries competing, along with the tournament's previous when all 20 countries were in action.

Where is the tournament being held?

Japan. See the full list of stadiums hosting the games.

What are the latest standings?

Here's a basic run-down of how the tournament format works:

The opening group stage of the competition sees 20 teams attempt to battle their way out of four Pools - A, B, C and D. Each Pool contains five teams and only two can advance into the knockout rounds.

From there it is standard quarter-final, semi-final, final format.
description: The 2019 Rugby World Cup is fast approaching its concluding stages as England, New Zealand, Wales, and South Africa prepare for the semi-finals this weekend.
